# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

**Title:** Roofing Repairs - Cape Breton
**Reference No.**: WS4528997654-Doc4529057803
**Publication Date:** April 17, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** May 14, 2024, at 2:00 PM (local time)

## Tender Description

This bid invitation is for work under the Service Requirements (SRV) category. The tender includes repairs and installation of various types of roofing systems on various buildings of Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax in the Cape Breton Detachment.

## Tender Requirements

> The successful bidder must provide all necessary labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision to complete the repairs and installations as specified in the tender documents.

## Eligibility and Exclusions

The tender is open to all interested suppliers. However, certain trade agreements may apply, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others.

## Contact Information

- **Contracting Authority**: Richard Parsons, Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
- **Email**: [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: Not available
- **Fax**: Not available

## Document and Attachment

This tender comes with an attachment for download. However, it is not included in this announcement. Suppliers can access it on the Ariba discovery platform as per the attached link.

## Notice and URL
